description: Upgrade plan to migrate Java project to latest LTS versions

tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to version 21 (latest LTS). Update build configuration files (pom.xml or build.gradle) to target Java 21. Handle any deprecated APIs or breaking changes introduced in Java 21.
tasks.taskSummary: Upgraded Java from 1.8 to 21 (LTS). Updated pom.xml compiler source/target and java.version to 21. Spring Boot upgraded from 2.7.18 to 3.3.5 to support Java 21 (Spring Boot 2.7.x does not officially support Java 21). Migrated javax.* to jakarta.* namespace in Photo.java. Updated Dockerfile to use eclipse-temurin:21. Build and unit tests pass successfully.

tasks.description: Upgrade Spring Boot to version 3.4 (latest stable)
tasks.requirements: Upgrade Spring Boot to version 3.4 and Spring Framework to 6.x. Migrate from javax.* to jakarta.* namespace. Update dependencies and handle any breaking changes in Spring Boot 3.x including configuration properties, security configurations, and actuator changes.
tasks.taskSummary: Upgraded Spring Boot from 3.3.5 to 3.4.7 (latest stable 3.4.x). jakarta.* namespace was already migrated in task 001. Build passes and unit tests pass.
